name: Exospace Combat Prototype
description:
Welcome to the first pre-release of Exospace.  It is a combat focused demo where you are in an asteroid field hunting for whatever advantages you can find before the destroyer is made manifest.

In space, you do not have friction.  Your ship will drift if you do not alter your trajectory.  Maybe if you explore enough you may find a place where things are different...

Design-wise this demo was Sinistar inspired in that the player tries to find advantages in the world until an extremely dangerous entity spawns.  There are 2 drive upgrades and 2 upgrades that radically increases the fire rate of a couple of the weapons you have.   There are rather nasty machines and strange folk in pink spacecraft.

And all this is at most, a brief glimpse into a much deeper cosmic abyss.  A small taste of what is to come.  Consider following for more prototypes and even releases.
